Listen on usb port (using free device monitoring studio)
hdkcom.exe -port COM14 460800 -uart -r 39 -play rec_ref_play.bit

wr: 0x61 0x00 0x04 0x04 0x00 0x02 0x2F 0x2D (gen cmd on P1)
rd: 0x61 0x00 0x01 0x04 0x01

wr: 0x61 0x00 0x11 0x00 0x10 0x00 0x32 0x00 0x40 0x0B 0x07 0x09 0x27 0x05 0x18 0x40 0x15 0x00 0x01 0x2F 0x37 (gen cmd on P1)
rd: 0x61 0x00 0x10 0x00 0x10 0x00 0x32 0x00 0x40 0x00 0x0B 0x00 0x09 0x00 0x05 0x00 0x15 0x00 0x2F 0x4F

wr: 0x61 0x00 0x0A 0x00 0x44 0x03 0x80 0x02 0xA0 0x49 0x00 0x0A 0x2F 0x03 (gen cmd on P1)
rd: 0x61 0x00 0x06 0x00 0x44 0x00 0x49 0x00 0x2F 0x24

wr: 0x61 0x00 0x04 0x00 0x2A 0x00 0x2F 0x01 (gen cmd on P1)
rd: 0x61 0x00 0x04 0x00 0x2A 0x00 0x2F 0x01

rd: 0x61 0x00 0x10 0x01 0x01 0x48 0xD9 0x8D 0xB0 0x56 0xBB 0x3C 0x42 0x7D 0x13 0x02 0x00 0x02 0x2F 0x6E

//then jumps to send audio data below

//start - these are not inputed from usb
0x61 0x00 0x2C 0x00 0x38 0x00 0x47 0x49 0x00 0x0A 0x44 0x03 0x80 0x02 0xA0 0x44 0x03 0x80 0x01 0x41 0x44 0x03 0x80 0x04 0x83 0x44 0x03 0x80 0x05 0x3E 0x44 0x03 0x80 0x05 0xBB 0x44 0x03 0x80 0x06 0x04 0x48 0x00 0x80 0x49 0x00 0x0A 0x2F 0x56
(generated on P1 because of "0x61 0x00 0x04 0x04 0x00 0x02 0x2F 0x2D")

(generated on P1 because of "0x61 0x00 0x0A 0x00 0x44 0x03 0x80 0x02 0xA0 0x49 0x00 0x0A 0x2F 0x03")

(generated on P1 because of "0x61 0x00 0x04 0x00 0x2A 0x00 0x2F 0x01")
